src:
ATP FINALE: Novak u grupi sa Federerom
Obavljen žreb za završni masters sezone, Srbina pogledala Fortuna. Prvi meč našeg asa u nedelju posle 15 časova protiv Beretinija

05 Nov 2019

Aleksander Zverev, momak koji je prošle godine iznenadio Novaka Đokovića u finalu završnog mastersa u Londonu, danas je tradicionalno radio na žrebanju za ovogodišnje izdanje ovog prestižnog takmčenja.
I može se reći da je bio sretne ruke za našeg asa koji je postavljen za lidera Crvene grupe kao drugi reket sveta, jer su se u njoj su se našli Rodžer Federer, Dominik Tim i Mateo Beretini. Sve igrači sa koji više-manje odgovaraju Srbinu.
Kada se vidi spisak Plave grupe, gde je nositelj Rafael Nadal, sve je jasno, jer su tu momci koji umeju da ga namuče, čak i na tvrdim podlogama u zatvorenom, a to su Danil Medvedev, Aleksander Zverev i Stefanos Cicipas.
Turnir počinje u nedelju, a naš sa će igrati prvo protiv Beretinija negde posle 15 časova, a u 21 čas rekete ukrštaju Federer i Tim. Plava grupa počinje takmičenje u ponedeljak. Kao što se i očekivalo,  organizatori su dali tako Nadalu još jedan dan da izleči povređeni trbušni mišić zbog kojeg je nedavno predao polufinale mastersa u Parizu. Ukoliko u tome ne uspe zameniće ga njegov sunarodnik Roberto Bautista Agut.
Da podsetimo, u Londonu će Nole pokušati da povrati ATP tron na koji se od ponedeljka vratio upravo Nadal sa 640 poena prednosti. O kalkulacijama kako bi to moglo da se dogodi, čitajte OVDE

(Foto: Reuters)
text:
ATP FINALE: Novice in the group with Federer
Completed draw for the final masters of the season, the Serb looked at Fortune. The first match of our ace on Sunday after 3pm against Beretini

05 Nov 2019

Alexander Zverev, the guy who surprised Novak Djokovic last year in the finals of the final Masters in London, today has traditionally worked on a draw for this year's edition of this prestigious competition.
And it can be said that he was the lucky hand for our ace, who was appointed leader of the Red Group as the second racquet in the world, as it featured Roger Federer, Dominic Tim and Mateo Beretini. All players who more or less match the Serb.
When you see the list of the Blue Group, where Rafael Nadal is the bearer, everything is clear, because there are guys who can torture him, even on hard indoor floors, namely Danil Medvedev, Alexander Zverev and Stefanos Cicipas.
The tournament begins on Sunday, and our sa will play first against Beretini sometime after 3pm, and at 9pm the racquet crosses Federer and Tim. The Blue Group begins the competition on Monday. As expected, the organizers gave Nadal another day to heal his injured abdominal muscle, which he recently handed over to the Paris Masters semifinals. If he fails, he will be replaced by his compatriot Roberto Bautista Agut.
To remind, in London, Nole will try to reclaim the ATP throne, which Nadal returned with a 640 point advantage on Monday. For calculations for this to happen, read HERE

(Photo by Reuters)
